name: trustline
description: Write a program that implements a trustline and exposes an interface (such as an API or interactive shell) for a user to interact with the trustline. Each user will run a separate instance of the service and once both processes are started, each user should be able to send money to the other and view their own balance.
author: The Architect <thearchitect@nousacademy.com> (https://nousacademy.github.io/)
